macclone.desc: When you connect to a public hotspot, use a random MAC address if you do not want the hotspot to know your real MAC address or to limit your access to the Internet based on it.
macclone.tips: If your hotel or other business location's network requires authentication, you may need to use the MAC cloning.
macclone.no_mac_tips: Generated when the interface is enabled
macclone.current_interface_as_lan_tips: 目前接口是 LAN 口，切换成 WAN 口时配置生效
